Parameter.Name: Port
Parameter.Description: Many programming blocks require that you select the ports on the EV3 Brick (A, B, C, D, 1, 2, 3, and 4) that these blocks will use. The Port Selectors are in the top right-hand corner of these blocks.

Parameter.Name: Direction
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Notes: Direction of the infrared signal.

Parameter.Name: Strength
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Notes: Intensity of the infrared signal.

Parameter.Name: Comparison
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Allowed Values: 0 - 5
Notes: 0: = (Equal to)
1: ≠ (Not Equal to)
2: > (Greater than)
3: ≥ (Greater than or Equal to)
4: < (Less than)
5: ≤ (Less than or Equal to)

Parameter.Name: Threshold
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Allowed Values: Any number
Notes: Value to compare sensor data to

Parameter.Name: Result
Parameter.Description:
Type: Logic
Notes: True/False result of a Compare mode.

Block.Description: The Measure - AC Direction mode detects the direction of the infrared signal corresponding to the RCJ soccer infrared ball (A mode) and outputs the result.
The Measure - AC Strength mode detects the intensity of the infrared signal corresponding to the RCJ soccer infrared ball (A mode) and outputs the result.
The Measure - DC Direction mode detects the direction of the infrared signal corresponding to the RCJ soccer infrared ball (B mode) and outputs the result.
The Measure - DC Strength mode detects the intensity of the infrared signal corresponding to the RCJ soccer infrared ball (B mode) and outputs the result.

The Compare - AC Strengh mode compare the detected infrared intensity to the Threshold Value using the selected Compare Type. The True/False result is output in Compare Result, and the detected infrared intensity is output in Measured Value.

The Compare - DC Strengh mode compare the detected infrared intensity to the Threshold Value using the selected Compare Type. The True/False result is output in Compare Result, and the detected infrared intensity is output in Measured Value.
